entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:20 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain or snow at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm except snowfall amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 50 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain or snow at times heavy changing to snow at times heavy overnight. Local blowing snow. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm except snowfall amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
